metadata.name: Assemblage #1
metadata.description:
Assemblage analyzes the visual features of a token, deconstructs its aesthetics and assembles it into a newly-created piece in the Ethereum blockchain.

[Source Token](https://opensea.io/assets/0x1fFF1e9e963f07AC4486503E5a35e71f4e9Fb9FD/2970)

[View side by side](https://api.assemblage.ee/mainnet/1/image_comparison.png)
